## UnicodeUtils.rtlBlocks variable

Unicode Blocks which have inherent RTL direction. These blocks correspond to the scripts described here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Right-to-left\#List\_of\_RTL\_scripts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rtlBlocks: string[]
```
